form.label: Zeek Files (V2.0)
form.description: V2 Additions: Dashboard Now Rides The Zeek_Suite Datamodel

single.title: Total Zeek File Logs (Excluding Known Scanners)

search.query:
| tstats summariesonly=f count from datamodel=Zeek_Suite.Files by Files.attachment_type, Files.file_name, Files.md5 | rename Files.attachment_type AS attachment_type, Files.file_name AS file_name, Files.md5 AS md5
| eval file_name=lower(file_name) | where like (file_name, "%.ps1") OR like (file_name, "%.exe") | sort by -count | rename attachment_type AS "File Type", file_name AS Filename, md5 AS MD5, count AS Count

| tstats summariesonly=f count from datamodel=Zeek_Suite.Files by Files.attachment_type, Files.file_name, Files.md5 | rename Files.attachment_type AS attachment_type, Files.file_name AS file_name, Files.md5 AS md5
| eval file_name=lower(file_name) | where like (file_name, "%.txt") | where !like (file_name, "json.txt") AND !like (file_name, "windows\temp\fstmp\fs_smbfile_%.%.%.%-%.txt") | sort by -count | rename attachment_type AS "File Type", file_name AS Filename, md5 AS MD5, count AS Count

| tstats summariesonly=f count from datamodel=Zeek_Suite.Files by Files.attachment_type, Files.file_name, Files.md5, Files.src, Files.dest, Files.dest_port | rename Files.attachment_type AS attachment_type, Files.file_name AS file_name, Files.md5 AS md5, Files.src AS src, Files.dest AS dest, Files.dest_port AS dest_port
| eval file_name=lower(file_name) | where like (file_name, "$T-Filename$") | sort by -count | rename attachment_type AS "File Type", file_name AS Filename, md5 AS MD5, count AS Count, src AS "Source IP", dest AS "Destination IP", dest_port AS "Destination Port"

| tstats summariesonly=f count from datamodel=Zeek_Suite.Files by Files.attachment_type, Files.file_name, Files.md5, Files.src, Files.dest, Files.dest_port | rename Files.attachment_type AS attachment_type, Files.file_name AS file_name, Files.md5 AS md5, Files.src AS src, Files.dest AS dest, Files.dest_port AS dest_port
| eval file_name=lower(file_name) | where like (md5, "$T-MD5$") | sort by -count | rename attachment_type AS "File Type", file_name AS Filename, md5 AS MD5, count AS Count, src AS "Source IP", dest AS "Destination IP", dest_port AS "Destination Port"
